# state

**Instance Property**

The current status of data coming from a provider.

## Declaration

```swift
final var state: DataProviderState { get }
```

## Inspecting an image-tracking provider

- **description**: A textual representation of this image tracking provider.
- **allAnchors**: An array of all the image anchors the provider is tracking.
